name: Box Fights Champions
description:
* Welcome to my Box Fights Game

*1v1 your friends

*New Skins and Cosmetics and Hats Coming soon

*Enjoy and have fun

- There is confirmation that there are now no viruses on this game. This has been confirmed by many people and they are false flags, if you have any concerns please contact me on discord Kmyrii#1491

To Play future updates download the modules for the updates then you will be able to run the game.

So far out the 7 years of my game development with games like this and others I have no complaintive feedback in regards to these false flags. Let me know if u have questions.
